name: Bottle Shooting: Club Bar Gun
description:
Bottle Shooting: Club Bar Gun Shoot has been built as a precision shooting game that will maximize your gun shooting pleasure for bottle shooting in the shooting range.This bottle shooter game depicts bottle shooting with pistol shooting by an army soldier. This bottle shooter game has different bottle shooting objectives. Each level in this bottle shooter game has an interesting shoot objective for the pistol shooting.
FEATURES:
Realistic bottle smashing sounds
Different but interesting thrilling levels
Every mission has complexity for real shooter
Amazing 3D graphics and sound effects
Easy to play but difficult to master game
